title: Sample Time Trigger Function Block
description: This function block triggers an output based on the elapsed time since the last trigger. It reads the system time and compares it with a specified period (PT). If the elapsed time meets or exceeds the specified period, it outputs the input value and sets a trigger flag. Otherwise, the trigger flag is set to false.
name: SH_1

input.name: in
input.description: The input value to be output when the trigger condition is met.

input.name: PT
input.description: The time period that must elapse before the output is updated.

output.name: out
output.description: The output value that reflects the input when the trigger condition is met.

output.name: Trig
output.description: A boolean flag that indicates whether the output has been updated.
